Title: Calling the Blue Dragons
Description:
I can no longer be afraid of reuniting the blue dragons, $n. It is better for us to be a family... than a fragment of our former selves.

Even if I cannot reclaim the oathstone, I can still use its power to send a message to all of the blue dragons. 

It is time they received word... from their Aspect.
ObjectivesText: View Kalecgos call back the blue dragonflight.
